articles.title: Spam law can’t protect South Africans from phone marketers - MyBroadband
articles.description: The Protection of Personal Information Act does not include sales calls under its definition of unsolicited electronic communication.
articles.content:

articles.title: ‘Pretty nasty’ Monkeypox likened to cowpox by scientist as two strains emerge - Express
articles.description: MONKEYPOX may be spreading through close contacts in the UK after arriving from West Africa, but though it can be 'a pretty nasty and infectious disease', Britons should not worry about the return of another pandemic, experts say.
